short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to help in writing emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EZMail is a productivity extension that helps users generate email content quickly and easily. With just a few clicks, EZMail generates both the subject line and body of an email, based on user input for the recipient, tone, and message. By leveraging the power of OpenAI's language generation API, EZMail can create emails that are both personalized and professional, saving users time and effort in crafting their own messages.

EZMail is ideal for anyone who frequently sends emails for work, school, or personal communication. By automating the email writing process, EZMail can help users streamline their workflow and increase their productivity. Additionally, since EZMail generates content based on user input, the resulting emails are tailored to the specific needs and preferences of each user.

With its simple, intuitive interface and powerful AI capabilities, EZMail is a must-have extension for anyone looking to streamline their email writing process and save time.
